title: Kathryn Hahn On Birth, Politics And 'Private Life'
description:
Kathryn Hahn dazzled audiences in one of the biggest streaming hits of the year, WandaVision— and she just earned an Emmy nom for her performance. In this conversation with her from 2019, she and Sam talk about her film 'Private Life,' balancing politics in her work, and the nature of birth.

You can follow us on Twitter @NPRItsBeenAMin and email us at samsanders@npr.org.
